articles.content:

articles.title: Ballance signs two-year-deal with Zimbabwe in bid to give career 'a fresh start' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The former England batter was released by Yorkshire this week; he should be available for selection for Ireland's tour of Zimbabwe next month
articles.content: "The opportunity to represent Zimbabwe has given me a new-found passion and excitement for the game"  •  Getty Images

articles.title: Evolving Shreyas Iyer firmly staking his claim for ODI No. 4 spot - ESPNcricinfo
